name: convertav1
description: CLI to convert a video to AV1 at ~50% of original size using ffmpeg/ffprobe (NVENC or libsvtav1)
author: Stephan Orgiazzi

scripts.bundle:win: bun run icon:from-svg && bun run build:win && bun run shortcut:win
scripts.bundle:mac-x64: bun run icns:from-svg && bun run build:mac-x64 && bun scripts/macos-app.ts convert-av1-macos-x64 'Convert AV1' assets/icon.icns com.convertav1.app
scripts.bundle:mac-arm64: bun run icns:from-svg && bun run build:mac-arm64 && bun scripts/macos-app.ts convert-av1-macos-arm64 'Convert AV1' assets/icon.icns com.convertav1.app
scripts.bundle:linux-x64: bun run png:from-svg && bun run build:linux-x64 && bun scripts/linux-app.ts convert-av1-linux-x64 'Convert AV1' assets/icon.png convert-av1-linux-x64-app
scripts.bundle:linux-arm64: bun run png:from-svg && bun run build:linux-arm64 && bun scripts/linux-app.ts convert-av1-linux-arm64 'Convert AV1' assets/icon.png convert-av1-linux-arm64-app
scripts.bundle:all: bun run bundle:win && bun run bundle:mac-x64 && bun run bundle:mac-arm64 && bun run bundle:linux-x64 && bun run bundle:linux-arm64
